titleStmt.title: The co[n]futacyon of Tyndales answere made by syr Thomas More knyght lorde chau[n]cellour of Englonde
Confutacyon of Tyndales answere. Part 1
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
Tyndale, William, d. 1536. Answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.

notesStmt.note: A reprinting of and reply to: Tyndale, William. An answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.
A second part was published in 1533.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
